QuestData.Title: The Ultimate Footbomb Uniform
QuestData.Description: Look, kid, I'm here to see to it that you've got a fighting chance at the end game. Thrall's going to need your help in the fight against the Trade Prince.$B$BGreely, Hobart, and I have a plan to put together the ultimate footbomb uniform for you so that you can win the game, but I'm going to need some things first.$B$BLucky for us, this lumber yard is sick with spare shredder parts. Now get out there and give me 110%!
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's see what you have there, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Yeah, these will do nicely. You did good, kid. I'll see to it that you get the best footbomb uniform ever made.$B$BIn the meantime, you've got other bombs to drop on the Trade Prince's lackeys.
